headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett has made bold bets on the oil market by investing in Chevron and Occidental Petroleum.  Chevron expects to produce an additional $9 billion in free cash flow next year even if oil prices fall.  Occidental expects to generate an additional $1.5 billion in free cash flow by 2027 from non-oil sources.
